name: 莉亚·维达科维奇
name_full: 莉亚·维达科维奇 Lea Vidakovic
introduction: Lea Vidakovic is a multimedia artist, film director, researcher and educator working with animated installations, expanded media practices and puppet animation. She holds a BA/MA of graphic and painting (Academy of Arts, Zagreb); BA in animation (HVO, Norway); MA of audio-visual arts (KASK, Belgium); PhD in animation studies (NTU/ADM Singapore). She participated in numerous exhibitions, 200+ animation festivals, residencies and scientific conferences and is a winner of several art and film awards. Lea teaches animation and photography at Lusofona University, Lisbon.
